alert.note: Alert for Far Northwest Highlands; Santa Fe Metro Area; Upper Rio Grande Valley (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 24 at 3:27AM MST until November 25 at 1:00PM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 1 PM MST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations generally between 1 and 3 inches. * WHERE...Far Northwest Highlands, Santa Fe Metro Area, and Upper Rio Grande Valley. * WHEN...From 5 PM this afternoon to 1 PM MST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Tire traction will be reduced. Extend the distance between your vehicle and the vehicle in front of you. This includes along portions of I-25. The hazardous conditions could impact holiday travelers.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions, dial 511 or 1.800.432.4269, or visit http://nmroads.com.

area.areaDesc: Far Northwest Highlands; Santa Fe Metro Area; Upper Rio Grande Valley
